name: ESPN NBA Hangtime '95
overview: NBA HAngtime '95 takes it to the hoop with the ultimate in 2-on-2 half-court action. Choose from 81 of the hottest players in the NBA from all 27 teams. Special button combos let you unleash awesome player moves - two handed power dunks by Hakeem Olajuwon, reverse dunks by Chris Webber, spin moves by Scottie Pippen and more! Then for something completely different, play ESPN 2-on-2 World Tour mode with streetball players from around the world. NBA Hangtime '95, Everything Else is Just Practice.
